post.title: samsung smarthub help
post.content: hi, i have just bought a ps51d6900. the picture etc is superb but i have a few problems. 1 no web browser even though the reviews i have read says there is one. 2 cannot get the tv to link with my dell laptop on wi fi. the smarthub is showing the laptop but not letting me to link up.i have a bt homehub. not sure if the issue is with the tv, homehub or laptop. any help really appreciated.
